books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: A New York City detective and an F.B.I. special agent track down a killer who decapitates numerous victims.
books.name: CITY OF ENDLESS NIGHT

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Pierce Brown
books.description: The fourth book of the Red Rising Saga. A hero of the revolution finds his fate tied up with others as the war continues.
books.name: IRON GOLD

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: A symbology professor goes on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: The events surrounding a hedge fund manager, his ex-wife and his fiancée are told from several points of view.
books.name: THE WIFE BETWEEN US

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Vi Keeland
books.description: An affair begins at another couple's wedding.
books.name: SEX, NOT LOVE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Three students at a sleazy for-profit law school hope to expose the student-loan banker who runs it.
books.name: THE ROOSTER BAR

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: A new collection of poetry from the author of "Milk and Honey."
books.name: THE SUN AND HER FLOWERS

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Heidi McLaughlin
books.description: A musician returns to his hometown after 10 years and tries to rekindle a relationship with his high school girlfriend.
books.name: FOREVER MY GIRL

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: A complete collection of Jack Reacher stories.
books.name: NO MIDDLE NAME

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: It’s 2044, life on a resource-depleted Earth has grown increasingly grim, and the key to a vast fortune is hidden in a virtual-reality world.
books.name: READY PLAYER ONE

books.author: by E.L. James
books.description: Christian Grey's tormented and difficult pursuit of Anastasia Steele is told from his perspective.
books.name: DARKER
